en: You read online exercise helps with productivity, mood, and energy, but are worried taking an extra hour out of your day will hurt how much you get done. Become a member at your local gym?
The extra exercise makes you sore and grumbly, and at first you take a hit to productivity. However, within a few days your energy soars. You find you can stay focused much longer than before.
You can't afford to lose an hour a day, not at this juncture. You hunker down to keep working, with a niggling voice in the back of your mind reminding you that your health will take a hit for it.
